constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: SB1  South of the Borough
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of rear dormer extension with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed rear dormer extension, three rooflights to the front roof slope, partial removal of the rear chimney stack and alterations to the soil vent pipe  fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B, C and G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Condition 10 (Waste and Recycling) of planning permission 20/01830/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

For the sake of clarity please may we ask that you amend the application form to confirm if the conservatory is being extended or demolished and a new extension be erected as a replacement. If the application is just for an extension to the existing extension with a replacement roof, kindly state this in the application form, as this is not clear
